messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cargo, MOVE FREIGHT, We need to PROFIT hard today.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention Crew. Daniella Bell is now a CHAINSAW ARM HoS!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HOWDY, FELLAS. THE BAR IS NOW HOSTING A BEER FUCKING PARTY.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mech Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Morgue.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I hereby declare pepsiman

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I pepsiman, am hereby captain. as my first decree, thermite is now the legal all access card and a passage shall be opened to chemistry to reach it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Ducktales Messy Station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Reboot them APC's by goin up to em and tapping away at em

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have triangulated the source of the telesporatic voices on the MINING BASE, we expect you to intervene

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: fine, shuttle is eta 20 m in, if this isnt fixed byt the time you get back, were gunning you down.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Prison Wing.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Come at me motherfuckers, killed pepsiman

messages.body: Gtfo culto i escped and you may have stolen my headet but im here nibbas
